name: Food Chain (Skill Card)
text:
Hassleberry / Skill
[ SKILL ACTIVATION ]
Flip this card over when you activate this Skill.

[ SKILL EFFECT ]
Once per turn, you can apply 1 of these Skills.
● Destroy 1 Dinosaur or Reptile monster you control, then Special Summon 1 Dinosaur monster whose Level is 1 higher from your hand or Deck.
● You can Tribute Summon 1 Dinosaur monster by banishing 2 Dinosaur and/or Reptile monsters from your GY instead of Tributing (it is still treated as a Tribute Summon).
